name: Cache System Optimization (Multi-Metric)
description: Optimize a caching system to simultaneously achieve high hit rate, low memory usage, fast access time, and correct eviction behavior
goal: Fix and optimize the cache system to satisfy ALL constraints: (1) hit_rate >= 0.80, (2) peak_memory_mb <= 128, (3) avg_access_time_ms <= 5, (4) eviction_correct == true. Fix bugs in cache.py and optimize main.py. Run with 'python main.py' and ensure it writes artifacts/metrics.json with all four metrics.
